From Destination Check-in Check-out Guests
  New Delhi   Kashmir   Sat, 29 Dec 2024   Thu, 03 Jan 2025   2

Here’s Your Itinerary : Special itinerary in favor of Kashmir

7 Days | 6 Nights - 2N Srinagar - 1N Gulmarg - 2N Pahalgam - 1N Srinagar

Day 1 : Srinagar airport Arrival & same day local sightseeing | approx 30 Mints per way - 10 Km | (Check-in 2 o Clock & Check-Out 12:00 PM)

On your arrival at the Srinagar International Airport, you will be taken for a 35-minute drive through the heart of New Srinagar city, passing the Abdullah Bridge which connects the banks of the Jhelum River. Visit the famous Mughal gardens of Nishat garden, Shalimar garden, Cheshmashahi, Hazratbal Shrine, Shankaracharya Temple & Pari mahal, we will explore the gardens and later drive back to the Srinagar for dinner and Overnight stay at Srinagar

Day 2 : Srinagar – Sonmarg – Srinagar | approx 2:10 Hrs per way - 80 Km |

After breakfast, drive to Sonmarg. Cross the town of Kangan, Mammar, Gagangir. Once you reach Sonmarg, take a 3-hour walk or horseback trip to the Thajiwas glacier. After returning, visit the small town market. Dinner & night stay at Srinagar.

Day 3 : Srinagar to Pahalgam | approx 2:20 Hrs per way - 90 Km |

After breakfast, check out from the hotel and we drive to Pahalgam via Pampore, Awantipura and the village of Bijbehara which remains famous as the breadbasket of Kashmir. We switch from the national highway 1A at Khanabal and drive through the second largest city of Anantnag. From here the road turns scenic as we drive parallel to the Lidder River flowing in the opposite direction. In Pahalgam, check in at the hotel. Later you can visit many breathtaking places like Betab Valley, Aru valley &Chandanwari at your own cost. Later in the evening return to your stay at Pahalgam.

Day 4 : Pahalgam Local Sightseeing

Today morning enjoy your sumptuous breakfast at your stay.

Today you can visit many breathtaking places like Betab Valley, Aru valley &Chandanwari at our own cost. Later in the evening return back to your stay at Pahalgam

Day 5 :Pahalgam – Gulmarg | approx 3:30 Hrs per way - 142 Km |

After breakfast in the morning, Check out from the Hotel, and proceed towards Gulmarg. En route, you get to see the beautiful Tangmarg town and drive ahead on a scenic drive of 14 kilometers to Gulmarg. Arrive at Gulmarg early in the afternoon and check in to the Hotel. Later, begin a short tour, boarding the Gondola cable car system (the 08 minutes ropeway). Descend back to Gulmarg after an hour and later indulge in some horse-riding. Dinner and night stay at Hotel in Gulmarg.

Gondola Online Ticket Portal Link - https://www.jammukashmircablecar.com

Day 6 : Gulmarg to Srinagar | approx 2:25 Hrs per way - 51 Km |

Today morning after breakfast leave for Srinagar. Srinagar is the largest city and the summer capital of Jammu and Kashmir, India. It lies in the Kashmir Valley on the banks of the Jhelum River, a tributary of the Indus, and Dal and Anchar lakes. The city is known for its natural environment, gardens, waterfronts and houseboats. Check-in at your stay in Srinagar and enjoy the day at leisure.

Day 7 : Departure from Srinagar

After breakfast checkout from hotel as per your flight timings

Notes:

• Please note that above given packages are nett & non commissionable and based on Per Person

• Please note that vehicle will be provided as per package itinerary

• Please note that packages are valid from 15th Mar to June 2024

• In case of Honeymoon Package, please add INR 2500/- for Cake, Flower Decoration, Candle light dinner & Badam Milk on Day 01 of tour at Houseboat

• In case of Heavy snowfall at Gulmarg Guest needs to Hire a local taxi with chains on tyre 4x4 car from Tangmarg - Gulmarg to and fro for the Tourists safety and the same cost will be around 2000/ for both ways In case of Heavy snowfall at Sonmarg Guest needs to Hire a local taxi with chains on tyre 4x4 car

• Carry Post Paid Sim

• Carry Warm Clothes

• Valid Id Card

Important Notes:

• Check in time at hotel is 12:00 noon. (Early check in is subject to availability) & check out time of the hotel is 10:00

• The extra bed being provided at each hotel will be decided by the hotel owner and not the travel agent. So, in that case it is the sole decision of hotel owner that will they provide an extra bed in the form of roll over bed or cot

• We may reschedule the sightseeing days subject to weather conditions for ensuring smooth execution of tours.

• Though Kashmir has been witnessing huge tourist growth but the facilities of Hotel, Services, Aids etc., available here cannot be matched to those available in the cities and other developed destinations. Hotels in Kashmir are categorized on the basis of location, Services and costing and not as per Star Categorization i.e.; 1*, 2*, 3* and so on.

• We may have to re-schedule the sightseeing days due to closing of any monument during that particular day as to ensure smooth execution of tours.

• Extra cost would be applicable for any unforeseen event

• The company has been granted complete authority right to change the package costing due to increment in tariff & taxes of hotels, transportation or any other service that has been provided

• The vehicle provided to the client is not at his disposal.

• Transfers by Shikara from Shikara ghat to houseboat and back are provided free of cost, however occasionally during the season you may have to wait for 5-10 minutes for the shikara to come and pick you up as each houseboat has one attached shikara.

• By AC Vehicle We Mean Vehicle with Heating / Cooling Facility.

• By Non-AC Vehicle We Mean Vehicle with No Heating / Cooling Facility.

• International Roaming and Prepaid Cellular Connections do not work in J & K

• Please note that incase of heavy snow, clients have to take 4X4 Snow Jeep from Tangmarg (a place 12 Kms. before of Gulmarg - incase trip to Gulmarg). The supplement charges will be applicable Per Jeep for To&Fro transfers.

• At resorts like Gulmarg, Pahalgam&Sonmarg there are places like ARU Valley, Chandanwari, Betab Valley Thajwas Glacier, Gulmarg Locals, Pahalgam locals, &Sonmarg Locals you need to hire local transport of your own (Local Transport includes Cabs, Gondola Ride, Pony Rides, & Cart Rides)

Child Policy:

• 0 to 05 Years without bed Complimentary.

• Child above 05 to 09 years is Chargeable as per Extra Bed/CNB

• Child Above 9 years is Chargeable as per Extra Bed

• Child Above 12 Years is considered to be adult

Cancellation Policy:

Any Cancellation of Booking must be given in writing over an e-mail at our official email id and we shall refund the tour cost after deduction of applicable cancellation charges as under. In order to cover our expected loss from the cancellation of the booking there is set scale of charges which must be paid by you or any one traveling with you;

• From the booking date till 30 days prior to the arrival date, 25 % of the package cost is chargeable.

• From 30 days to 15 days prior to the arrival date, 50 % of the package cost is chargeable.

• From 15 days to 7 days prior to arrival date, 75 % of the package cost is chargeable.

• For cancellations made within 7 days prior to the arrival date, 100% of the package cost is chargeable

CANCELLATION DUE TO LANDSLIDE/SNOWFALL/BAD WEATHER/RIOTS:

• If the tour is cancelled/postponed due to landslide/snowfall/bad weather conditions/road blockade, riots or any weather/riots related problems at the last moment, no refund would be made.

• If the road is blocked and guests miss a stay at the next destination, the full cost of the hotel stay would be charged, in addition to the tariff of the hotel booked instantly by us for their emergency stay. However, guests can book and pay the hotel for emergency stay at their own expenses.

• If a particular destination is cancelled at the last moment, the full amount would be charged. This strict policy is applied as nature and its plays are beyond our control.

• Blocking of the road, especially due to unrest in Kashmir/Ladakh can also lead to change in booking at the last moment and guests are required to cooperate with us. In such circumstances, tourists will have to bear the expenses for any change. These are rare situations but can happen to anyone.

Extra Cost for Optional Activities

1. Betaab Valley, Aru Valley &Chandanwari (Pahalgam) @ 2800 Per 07-Seater vehicle

2. Zojila Pass, Thajwas Glacier (Sonamarg) @ 5500/- Approx. Per 07-Seater Vehicle

3. Gondola Ride (Gulmarg)1st Phase @900 / 2nd Phase @1100 Per Person above 03 Years of Age

4. Horse Ride @ 500 up to 2500

5. Any other Joy Ride or sports activity etc.
